protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the reversible transfer of the terminal phosphate group between ATP and AMP. This small ubiquitous enzyme involved in energy metabolism and nucleotide synthesis that is essential for maintenance and cell growth. Plays a key role in hematopoiesis.

go_class.description: phosphotransferase activity, phosphate group as acceptor
nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
